message.body: I forgot to ask ypu if you liked the gift In the gift card box
Yes I did! I don't know if you knew this, but I've been really wanting to try that place out
I meant to say thanks but we didn't open presents Christmas night. We did it the next morning while you were at work
That's fine but yea ots a voucher to cover both of you for two courses.... I'm sure they have a seperate menu for the voucher meals but that place has nutella French toast!!!!
I wanna try it there so let me know how the place is
Haha yeah that sounds good. I'll definitely let you know how it is
And had no idea you wanted to go there... came across the voucher and checked into it. Local plus good menu. Couldn't go wrong
Yeah I walk by it all the time in the Italian market. It's a small place and looks nice
Are we supposed to go to tutoring tomorrow? I'm supposed to go with Eden's family to her brother's tomorrow morning. But if we are I can ask them to leave a little later
Yea especially since we skipped last weekend
They're leaving at 11
So can we make sure we get at his house at 10
Ok they can pick you up from dawns?
Yea
Yeah
Ok so ill be ready earlier. And they can grab you from there
Okay thanks
Np
Coffee is on now. Just gotta now dry and straighten my hair then I'm done everything
Okay
